title: Radicchio, Gorgonzola and walnut risotto
ingredients: ['1L vegetable stock, or as needed', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1/2 carrot, minced', '1/2 stalk celery, minced', '2 tablespoons minced onion', '170g Arborio rice', '2 tablespoons red wine', '1 head radicchio, thinly sliced', '85g Gorgonzola cheese, cut into cubes', '40g chopped walnuts', '2 tablespoons balsamic glaze (reduced balsamic vinegar)', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan (optional)']
